Detailed Description

This is actor class for terrain.

This class is intended to be used for terrain. This class uses sub-classes with fewer features, but still more then enough features for static terrain. This helps reduce the memory footprint of the class as well as processing speed.

Parameters:
Initposition The location for this terrain.
name The name of the actor.
file The 3d mesh file that contains the 3d model the actor will use.
group The resource group where the 3d mesh and other related files can be found.
_World Pointer to the World this object will be added to.

Definition at line 93 of file actorterrain.cpp.

void phys::ActorTerrain::CreateShapeFromMeshStatic (  ) 

Creates a collision shape from mesh file.

This function will read the location of every verticy in the mesh file and use that to construct a triangle mesh shape and attach it to this objects collision shape. This shoiuld be used with only with Static objects.
